content.description: From the original entry: "start sitting on right side of the boulder. Start with a good right hand on the side and a left hand on an okay hold under the roof. Move up and left to the high point of boulder, and top out. This is about V1 or V2."
content.location: From the original entry: "This is on the low roof boulder directly below the large, freestanding "Pinnacle" Boulder."

content.description: Start sitting with your hands on sidepulls under the roof on the left side of the boulder. You get good foot holds below. Make a big move up to a good jug, then top out to your right or left. It is about V1 or V2.
content.location: This is on the low roof boulder directly below the large, freestanding "Pinnacle" Boulder.

content.description:
This is a small boulder below the Pinnacle Boulder in the Pinnacle Area. It has at least 2 problems on it.

 The GPS coordinates are not correct yet.
